title: Leylan Cham
text: Leylan Cham (, also <a href="Romanize">Romanize</a>d as Leylān Cham) is a village in <a href="Malavi%20Rural%20District">Malavi Rural District</a>, in the <a href="Central%20District%20%28Pol-e%20Dokhtar%20County%29">Central District</a> of <a href="Pol-e%20Dokhtar%20County">Pol-e Dokhtar County</a>, <a href="Lorestan%20Province">Lorestan Province</a>, <a href="Iran">Iran</a>. At the 2006 census, its population was 248, in 43 families.
